name: Brunch Barn
description:
Brunch Barn!

A small, roleplay game that places you in the boots of a farmer who woke up later than the agreed time. As a result of it, his beloved animals decided to protest and cut all contact with the farmer. But our smart farmer has come up with a solution, his trusty corngun, which is a double-barrel shotgun loaded with corn that he uses to deliver corn, in a fast manner, to his hungry animals. Upon being fed, the animals decide to give up on their protest and proceed to take a nap.

This is my first complete game/project which thought me a lot of new things. 

Special thanks to MrVastayan for all the help provided throughout the project's development.
